title: how to fight against fiora?
body:
i tried to "counter" fiora by picking {{champion:54}} , but it didnt work.

i did fine lvls 1-5, but once we hit lvl 6 she just kept beating me. 

pre-6 my score was 3-0, after she hit lvl 6 i couldn't beat her anymore.

she would just ult, crit me like crazy, heal like crazy and gg.  not to mention my final build look like this.
{{item:1319}} {{item:3068}} {{item:3075}} {{item:3143}} {{item:3110}} {{item:3001}}

replies.body: Just..walk away? Q her and walk away... wait till it wears off and then fight? Its not that hard..
have you fought a fiora?  new pbe has infinite slows, and like 3 free dashes.   i think she dashes more than yasuo
I don't think you've even played the FIora rework if you think she has 3 free dashs and infinite slows >_>
Don't let her hit your "spots" with her ult! it does %health true damage for some retarded reason.
It's so she kill everyone the same instead of blowing up squished and dying to tanks, she can fight both just slightly slower

> [{quoted}](name=Da Dwagonswayer,realm=NA,application-id=WEuoGbmp,discussion-id=cGNHUKxL,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-08-19T04:50:38.289+0000)
>
> It's so she kill everyone the same instead of blowing up squished and dying to tanks, she can fight both just slightly slower

Which is a retarded concept.
No it's not, she deals with everyone at the same rate it makes sense for her character and everything
Take {{champion:92}} against {{champion:114}} too much evident, Riven in OP as no sense... I don't really know who's better, {{champion:114}} or {{champion:92}} ???
Your malphite... I don't see why you should be able to beat one of the best duelist's in game (No pun intended)

> [{quoted}](name=DarkSoul245,realm=NA,application-id=WEuoGbmp,discussion-id=cGNHUKxL,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-08-19T05:06:47.640+0000)
>
> Your malphite... I don't see why you should be able to beat one of the best duelist's in game (No pun intended)

Because he's a fucking mountain?
Play Darius. {{champion:122}} They will regret opposing me! {{champion:122}}   {{item:3142}} Rush this in lane with {{item:3035}} vs fiora EZ money

You really just have to be mindful of your weak spots. Trade when it's hard to get to and avoid trades when it's easy. As for her ult...I really don't know. Every time she uses it you have to make a quick decision as to if you can burst her down before it fully activates or if you should avoid her entirely. She isn't much of a team fighter now from what I've seen but she's one hell of a duelist as she should be.
